What variable represents the player entity in-game by default? It’s very poorly named, but that’s how it is.[/quote]What? Dude I am sooo confused. I just restated coding… I could of told you all of this two years ago. Just point out what’s wrong with it please?

item.title: [PI] Taxbag Help. SIMPLE!
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

if (itemId == 10831) { if (player.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000000) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995,2000000000); c.getItems().addItem(10835,1); c.getItems().deleteItem(10831,1); c.sendMessage("You add two billion coins to your Taxbag."); } } if (itemId == 10835) { c.getItems().deleteItem(10835,1); c.getItems().addItem(995,2000000000); c.getItems().addItem(10831,1); c.sendMessage("You gain two billion coins, don't spend it all in one place now."); }
Yes and I appreciate the help, could you point out what needs to be renamed? Please and thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Taxbag Help. SIMPLE!
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:2, topic:458172”]I lol’d.

if (player.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 10000000000) { //Do stuffs } [/quote]
Well I gatta learn sometime right?
This is now my code,

if (itemId == 10831) { if (player.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000000) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995,2000000000); c.getItems().addItem(10835,1); c.sendMessage("You add two billion coins to your Taxbag."); c.getItems().deleteItem(10831,1); } } if (itemId == 10835) { c.getItems().deleteItem(10835,1); c.getItems().addItem(995,2000000000); c.sendMessage("You gain two billion coins, don't spend it all in one place now."); c.getItems().addItem(10831,1); }
and this is now my error:

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:113: error: ')' expected if (player.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000000) { 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: [PI] Taxbag Help. SIMPLE!
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

This is my code:

if (itemId == 10831) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995,1000000000); c.getItems().addItem(10835,1); c.getItems().deleteItem(10831,1); } if (itemId == 10835) { c.getItems().deleteItem(10835,1); c.getItems().addItem(995,1000000000); c.getItems().addItem(10831,1); }
So in game, when I click a empty taxbag(10831) WITHOUT having 1b in my inventory it still gives me the Full Taxbag(10835). How would I make it search for 1,000,000,000gp before it gives you the full taxbag, and if you don’t have it, it sends you a message saying so? Please help New to PI.

Read full topic
